name: Daddy Diffusion
description:
Bara, beefcakes, bodybuilders and beyond!


A model based on Bara, a genre of homo-erotic art centered around hyper-muscular men. While the model was designed around erotica, it is surprisingly artful and can create very whimsical and colorful images. You can also use it when designing muscular/heavy OCs for the exaggerated proportions.


-NOTES-

-The model was trained on a variety of art styles, so it can produce styles ranging from photoreal to flat/manga style. So specify what you want in the prompts (see recommended prompts).

-In addition to the art, the model was also trained using pictures of bodybuilders of different ethnicities. It took some testing to get it right, but the result is a model that accurately produces diverse sets of characters (unless prompted otherwise).

-The model tends to favor upperbody shots, so use the prompt "full body" or "whole body" for body shots.

-"Restore faces" makes the face look more photoreal, disable for a more stylized result.

-If the model is too much, merge it with the base SD. If its too little, add "huge" or "big muscles" into the prompt.


STRONGLY RECOMMENDED PROMPTS

bara, digital painting, masterpiece, realistic, detailed face, dramatic pose, 4k


STRONGLY RECOMMENDED NEGATIVE PROMPTS

disfigured, tumor, deformed, disfigured hands, extra digits, disfigured hands, cross eyed

modelVersions.name: V 1
modelVersions.description: First release, trained on 107 images for 15k steps

meta.prompt: bara, colorful lighting, digital painting, masterpiece, realistic, 4k, detailed face,
meta.negativePrompt: Deformed, disfigured, extra digits, jpeg artifacts, low quaility, tumor, cross eyed, bad hands, disfigured face
